name: Slimes Vs Skulls
description:
Slimes Vs Skulls is a Tafl game variant ,

  • Each player takes turns (Slimes go first) moving any one of their available pieces in a horizontal or vertical direction (similarly to the movement of a rook in chess), through any number of unoccupied squares.
  • Unlike in chess, pieces can not move into the square of an enemy piece and remove it from the board directly, instead they must be assisted by an ally piece directly on the adjacent horizontal or vertical square of an adjacent enemy piece.
